title: In the case of residential development and other non-industrial development permitted in the industrial zone, the area within the segregating distance as provided in the Table 18-B shall be planted with tress at the rate of not less than 5 per 100 sq
clause_text: In the case of residential development and other non-industrial development permitted in the industrial zone, the area within the segregating distance as provided in the Table 18-B shall be planted with tress at the rate of not less than 5 per 100 sq.m of such area.
